title: Big injuries, big contracts and BIG Announcement
itunes:title: Big injuries, big contracts and BIG Announcement
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler & Chris Wesseling – give you an episode you cannot afford to miss! The heroes have a huge announcement about some big plans for the podcast. (01:47). They also talk all things off-season football including Jason Verrett’s season ending injury(10:29), Julio Jones’ deal with the Falcons (14:33), and a trip to the Dawg Pound to visit the Browns (32:01). Greggy Does Dallas Part II (49:53) and Marc talks about the blood moon to wrap up the show! (53:56)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
